document.full_text: officials from the european commission, the european central bank and the international monetary fund will discuss the technical details of portugal's bailout aid next week, the european commission said on sunday.
document.title: eu, imf, ecb meet in lisbon next week for bailout aid
lines_and_colors: officials from the european commission, the european central bank and the international monetary fund will discuss the technical details of portugal's bailout aid next week, the european commission said on sunday.
